</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks whether given string name is [[localize]]d.  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isLocalized''' stringName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> stringName: [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>  

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[isLocalized]] "STR_DN_SNAKE") [[then]] {
	[[hint]] [[localize]] "STR_DN_SNAKE";
} [[else]] {
	[[hint]] "STR_DN_SNAKE";
	[[diag_log]] "ToDo: STR_DN_SNAKE is not localized";
};</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
